item.title: Stern
item.description: stern is a log tailer for k8s. Similar to tail -f but for multipe Kubernetes pods: 1 2 3 4 stern --only-log-lines \ --max-log-requests 1000 \ --namespace k8s-namesapce \ 'pod-wildcard*'
